mapper.select:
select top 16 s.ID, s.code,s.idcustomer,s.maker,s.auditor,s.madedate,s.auditeddate,s.Closer from SA_SaleOrder s
and s.ID not in (select top (#{startPos}) ID FROM SA_SaleOrder)
select distinct s.code,s.idcustomer,s.maker,s.madedate from SA_SaleOrder s where s.ID=#{0}
select distinct s.idcustomer from SA_SaleOrder s where s.code=#{0}
